sections.heading: Overview
content: Darren R. Williams, DDS, is a practicing oral and maxillofacial surgeon in Tennessee.

Williams graduated from the University of Tennessee College of Dentistry.  He completed a one-year internship in dentistry at Jewish Hospital in St. Louis in 1992. In 1996, Williams completed his residency in oral and maxillofacial surgery at St. Francis Medical Center in Pittsburgh.
Williams is a diplomate of the American Board of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery and is an assistant professor in the department of oral and maxillofacial surgery at the University of Tennessee.
Williams is a physician reviewer for Physicians' Review Network Inc., an independent medical review organization.
